00066 void cleanup(int ret)
00067 {
00068   // stop all mpi clients
00069 
00070 #ifdef MPI
00071   int task=TASKFIN;
00072   BroadcastTask(&task);
00073 
00074   MPI_Finalize();
00075 #endif
00076  
00077   // terminate program with return code
00078   exit(ret);
00079 }

00432     nconst++;
00433   }
00434   if (constgamma) {
00435     if (!constbeta) {
00436       fprintf(stderr, "gamma constraint only in combination with beta constraint\n");
00437       exit(-1);
00438     }
00439     Const[nconst] = ConstraintDetQ;
00440     Const[nconst].val = sqrt(4*M_PI/5)*constbval*cbrt(2*cos(3*constgval*M_PI/180));
00441     nconst++;
00442   }
00443   if (constpgamma || constngamma) {
00444     fprintf(stderr, "proton/neutron gamma constraint not implemented yet !\n");
00445     exit(-1);
00446   }

00474   char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
00475   char* parafile = argv[optind+1];
00476 
00477   Interaction Int;
00478   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00479     cleanup(-1);
00480   Int.cm = cm;
00481 
00482   Parameterization P;
00483   Para qinitial;
00484   if (readParafromFile(&P, &qinitial, parafile))
00485     cleanup(-1);
00486 
00487   SlaterDet Q, Qp;
00488   SlaterDetAux X;
00489 
00490   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00491   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Qp);
00492   if (!par)
00493     par = (Q.A % 2) ? -1 : +1;
00494 
00495   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00496   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00497   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00498 
00499 #ifdef MPI
00500   int task=TASKSTART;
00501   BroadcastTask(&task);
00502 
00503   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00504   BroadcastA(&Q.A);
00505 #endif
00506 
00507   complex double hd, hp, nd, np;
00508   double einitial, eintr;
00509 
00510   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00511 
00512   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Q, &X);
00513   nd = X.ovlap;
00514   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Q, &X, &hd);
00515   eintr = hd/nd;
00516 
00517   copySlaterDet(&Q, &Qp);
00518   invertSlaterDet(&Qp);
00519   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qp, &X);
00520   np = X.ovlap;
00521   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Qp, &X, &hp);
00522   
00523   einitial = (hd+par*hp)/(nd+par*np);
00524 
00525   int i;
00526   for (i=0; i<nconst; i++)
00527     fprintf(stderr, "# constraining %4s to %8.3f\n", 
00528             Const[i].label, Const[i].output(Const[i].val)); 
00529 
00530   fprintf(stderr, "\ninitial:\tE = %8.3f MeV,   Eintr = %8.3f MeV\n\n", 
00531           hbc*einitial, hbc*eintr);
00532 
00533   Para q;
00534   P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00535 
00536   // shaking the parameters ?
00537   if (shakemag) {
00538     shakePara(&q, shakemag);
00539   }
00540 
00541   // in FMD parameterization move SlaterDet to origin in phase space
00542   // if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD")) {
00543   //   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00544   //   moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00545   //   SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);

00548   // minimize !
00549   MinimizeDONLP2p(&Int, par, Const, nconst, &P, &q, maxsteps, log, parafile); 
00550 
00551   double e;
00552   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00553 
00554   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Q, &X);
00555   nd = X.ovlap;
00556   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Q, &X, &hd);
00557   eintr = hd/nd;
00558 
00559   copySlaterDet(&Q, &Qp);
00560   invertSlaterDet(&Qp);
00561   calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qp, &X);
00562   np = X.ovlap;
00563   calcHamiltonianod(&Int, &Q, &Qp, &X, &hp);
00564   
00565   e = (hd+par*hp)/(nd+par*np);
00566 
00567   fprintf(stderr, "\nfinal:  \tE = %8.3f MeV\n\n", hbc*e);
00568 
00569   // output files
00570 
00571   // backup of parafile
00572 
00573   backup(parafile);
00574 
00575   // save minimization result in MIN directory
00576   {
00577     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00578 
00579     // orient SlaterDet
00580     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00581 
00582     // normalize SlaterDet
00583     normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00584 
00585     // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00586     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00587       SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00588 
00589     // calculate the observables
00590     Observables Obs;
00591   
00592     calcObservablesParity(&Int, par, &Q, &Obs);
00593 
00594     ensuredir("MIN");
00595     char outfile[1024];
00596     sprintf(outfile, "MIN/%s-minp.%d", parafile, (int) time(NULL));
00597 
00598     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", outfile);
00599 
00600     FILE* outfp;
00601     if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00602       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00603       cleanup(-1);
00604     }
00605 
00606     fprintinfo(outfp);
00607 
00608     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00609             "# parity projected to %+d\n"
00610             "# using %s interaction\n", 
00611             cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, par, Int.name);
00612   
00613     fprintf(outfp, "\n# einitial: %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*einitial);
00614     fprintf(outfp, "# efinal:   %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00615 
00616     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00617 
00618     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00619     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00620     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00621  
00622     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00623     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00624 
00625     fclose(outfp);  
00626   }
00627 
00628   // save minimization result in parafile
00629   {
00630     // no improvement ? then write initial parameters
00631     if (!overwrite && einitial < e) 
00632       P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00633 
00634     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00635 
00636     // orient SlaterDet
00637     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00638 
00639     // normalize SlaterDet
00640     normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00641 
00642     // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00643     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00644       SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00645 
00646     // calculate the observables
00647     Observables Obs;
00648   
00649     calcObservablesParity(&Int, par, &Q, &Obs);
00650 
00651     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", parafile);
00652 
00653     FILE* outfp;
00654     if (!(outfp = fopen(parafile, "w"))) {
00655       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", parafile);
00656       cleanup(-1);
00657     }
00658 
00659     fprintinfo(outfp);
00660 
00661     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00662             "# parity projected to %+d\n"
00663             "# using %s interaction\n", 
00664             cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, par, Int.name);
00665   
00666     fprintf(outfp, "\n# einitial: %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*einitial);
00667     fprintf(outfp, "# efinal:   %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00668 
00669     if (overwrite)
00670       fprintf(outfp, "\n# overwrite flag: use new parameters\n\n");
00671     if (!overwrite && einitial < e)
00672       fprintf(outfp, "\n# no improvement by minimization: use initial parameters\n\n");
00673 
00674     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00675 
00676     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00677     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00678     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00679  
00680     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00681     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00682 
00683     fclose(outfp);  
00684   }
00685 
00686   fprintf(stderr, "... %4.2f minutes computing time used\n", usertime()/60.0);
00687 
00688   cleanup(0);
00689 
00690 #ifdef MPI
00691   }
00692 #endif
00693 }
